intension: Design an advertisement card to promote the sale of premium quality school equipment, with a focus on enhancing the learning experience for students.
globalcaption: The image features a blue background with a variety of school equipment displayed on it. There are several pencils of different sizes, with some located near the top left corner, others in the middle, and a few more towards the right side of the image. A pair of scissors can be seen in the middle-right area, and a ruler is positioned horizontally across the bottom left corner.\n\nAdditionally, there is a book placed in the lower-left part of the image, and a calculator is located in the middle-right area. The combination of these items suggests that this is a collection of essential school supplies.
keywords: equipment, education, sale, study, supplies, studying, educational equipment, school, stationery, blue, premium, instagram, post, insta, ig

bglayer.bgcaption: The image features a blue background with various tools and objects arranged on it. There are two rulers, one located towards the left side of the image and the other towards the right. A pair of scissors can be seen in the middle of the scene, and a tape measure is positioned towards the right side.\n\nIn addition to these tools, there are two books, one on the left side and the other on the right side of the image. A cell phone is also present, placed towards the right side of the scene. The combination of these objects creates a visually interesting and organized display
